books.title: The Box Office Murders
books.author: Freeman Wills Crofts
books.summary: The discovery of a drowned woman sets the police on the trail of a mysterious scam involving cinema cashiers.

books.title: The Blue Lagoon
books.author: H. de Vere Stacpoole
books.summary: After a shipwreck, two surviving children are stranded on an island paradise, experiencing its bounties and resources, facing the dangers of the natural world, and undergoing their own maturation and romance.

books.title: Up from Slavery
books.author: Booker T. Washington
books.summary: The autobiography of Booker T. Washington, former slave and founder of the Tuskegee Institute.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Little Lord Fauntleroy
books.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
books.summary: A poor young boy unexpectedly inherits a peerage and travels to England to live with his grandfather, an Earl.

books.title: The Way of the World
books.author: William Congreve
books.summary: Two lovers are prevented from marrying due to a previous dalliance.

books.title: He Who Gets Slapped
books.author: Leonid Andreyev
books.summary: A mysterious gentleman joins a circus troupe as a clown.

books.title: Zuni Folktales
books.author: Frank Hamilton Cushing
books.summary: A collection of folktales from the Zuni culture.

books.title: Howards End
books.author: E. M. Forster
books.summary: The lives of three families of different classes intertwine in Edwardian England.

books.title: The Turn of the Screw
books.author: Henry James
books.summary: A governess moves in to a haunted manor.

books.title: The Bolshevik Myth
books.author: Alexander Berkman
books.summary: A left-wing radical records his experiences in revolutionary Russia.

books.title: The Middle of Things
books.author: J. S. Fletcher
books.summary: The murder of a wealthy man raises questions about the identity of the young woman who is his ward.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Fernando Pessoa
books.summary: A collection of Fernando Pessoa’s poetry.

books.title: Zuleika Dobson
books.author: Max Beerbohm
books.summary: A beautiful magician unsuspectingly casts her charms on quiet Oxford.

books.title: The Purple Cloud
books.author: M. P. Shiel
books.summary: A young adventurer embarks on a polar expedition, only to return to an unbelievably different world.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.summary: A collection of short works by science fiction legend Philip K. Dick.

books.title: Heretics
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: A collection of essays in which G. K. Chesterton debates the intellectuals of his day on a range of topics.

books.title: Journals
books.author: Alexander Mackenzie
books.summary: Explorer Alexander Mackenzie details his journeys to both the Arctic and Pacific Oceans in his personal journals.
